name: MAZE (itch) (kr1stov)
description:
Hey everyone, 

The main idea was/is to find ways to make first person maze games enjoyable and not just have players run arround and find the exit. 

Well... I am truly sorry the current version is exactly just that 😭

I got distracted while trying to do as much via code. I wanted have to use the editor little as possible. Writing tools I probably would not have need, and trying out new workflows kept me from making an actual game 😅

A least I learned something 💪

The drawing mechanic I borrowed from another Game Jam game MYRKUR, I was part of a few weeks ago. Check it out. The maze gets procecdurally generated and increases with every level.

All in all I am totally not satisfied with the outcome. Thought I would have more time to work on it during the last week. Still I quite like how the systems I implemented worked out.

Best played in full screen mode. Otherwise keep left or middle mouse button pressed for better being able to look around.

===============================================================

Controls:

WASD -> move

Mouse -> look around

RMB -> activate draw mode

LMB -> draw
